argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mavmulval.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | mavmulval.m | |- .X. = ( R maVecMul <. N , N >. ) |
| 3 |  | mavmulval.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 4 |  | mavmulval.t | |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) |
| 5 |  | mavmulval.r | |- ( ph -> R e. V ) |
| 6 |  | mavmulval.n | |- ( ph -> N e. Fin ) |
| 7 |  | mavmulval.x | |- ( ph -> X e. ( Base ` A ) ) |
| 8 |  | mavmulval.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. ( B ^m N ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 3 | #P_matbas2 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> ( B ^m ( N X. N ) ) = ( Base ` A ) ) |
| 10 | 6, 5, 9 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( B ^m ( N X. N ) ) = ( Base ` A ) ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( ph -> X e. ( B ^m ( N X. N ) ) ) |
| 12 | 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 6, 11, 8 | #P_mvmulval | |- ( ph -> ( X .X. Y ) = ( i e. N |-> ( R gsum ( j e. N |-> ( ( i X j ) .x. ( Y ` j ) ) ) ) ) ) |
